name: The Guild 2: Renaissance
notes: Keep the default install path when asked by the installer for the launcher to work properly

files.gog_installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- gog_installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Guild 2 - Renaissance/GuildII.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directplay
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $gog_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
